Name: Routine Racers
About the game: Enjoy the most difficult game you've ever played , a crazy and funny side-scrolling 3D game set in daily routines like escaping from work, buying at the supermarket, having a drink in a bar, stopping a fire or capturing some narcos. · Run through 10 Routine Levels with unique skills to master: dodge, jump, roll, engage, brake, turbo, build and push . · Link this actions to achieve combos and getting extra speed and points. · Suffer the Tyranny of Monday with an Extra Endless Level : how long can you last? · With boring and badass enemies like poop, bosses, machines or secretaries that will judge you every time you fail. · Obstacles position change with each game, and secret paths and race twists will blow your mind. · Without Keanu Reeves but with Kerry Kaverga and Alotta Fagina. · Lovely and lazy low poly graphics . · Includes 42 amazing Steam Achievements . · One of the most most challenging, frustrating, and just plain punishing video games ever. · And of course acidic and uncomfortable jokes about the game industry and your mom.
